Trousers in soft, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey top, long-sleeved sweatshirt and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Patterned sweatshirt with press-studs at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Patterned trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Sweatshirt and trousers with a soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif on the front. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.
All-in-one suit in printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Gently fitted, knee-length dress in washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Sports vest top in burnout-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with sheer sections. Loose fit.
Sports vest top in burnout-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with sheer sections. Loose fit.
Sports vest top in burnout-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with sheer sections. Loose fit.
Fitted, turtleneck top in mesh with long sleeves. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hoodie in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hoodie in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a yoke at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Flap chest pocket with a tab and plastic fastener, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length track pants in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Decorative flatlock seams at the back, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Eleven pairs of studs and one pair of earrings with fabric tassels. Size from 0.2 cm to 4 cm.

Jumpsuit in slightly stretchy imitation leather with a brushed inside. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a collar, zip at the top, flap chest pockets and diagonal side pockets. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Boxy jumper in a soft, glittery knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Mesh-lined hood, a zip at the top with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms and an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Mesh-lined kangaroo pocket with a zip at each side, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Mesh lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pull-on trousers in lightweight, washed cotton denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets with a small frill trim, and ribbed hems.
Jacket in soft fleece with a high collar, zip down the front and a yoke in woven fabric. Side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft fleece with a high collar, zip down the front and a yoke in woven fabric. Side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.
Sports shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Diagonal side pockets, a back pocket with a concealed zip and a flap leg pocket containing a smaller zipped pocket. Mesh lining.

Jacket in patterned, stretch cotton twill with a collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs and fake flap chest pockets with a fake press-stud. Unlined.

Blouse in a soft viscose weave. V-neck with a small frill trim, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum with a gently rounded hem. Unlined.

Smarten up your footwear! Gentle but effective wet wipes in the perfect size. Smart, practical care designed to clean without damaging the leather, while helping your favourite footwear to last longer. Take care! 10-pack. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
